title: I need help i can not connect to the HTTP servers when my internet is fine
body: I have been trying to reinstall the game and it keeps saying "Cannot connect to the HTTP servers"

replies.body: You can definitely give Kanade's solution a go, but I would also suggest adjusting your [**permission settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) as well just in case your OS is blocking League from connecting to our servers. Hit me back up and let me know if either of those options worked!

Go to C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc and open the file "hosts" in notepad Then delete
"23.74.24.114 l3cdn.riotgames.com" from the bottom.

Additional note: Search Notepad from search bar and run as administrator and navigate to the file location and change file types to all files to avoid any issues that might arise while conducting this process.

This fix will avoid the RADS error and allow your old client to update into the new client after reinstallation. I got the solution from another post below this one so credits to them. Hope this helps! {{champion:240}}
